name: Mesozoic Mayhem
description:
Control the mini robot in his quest to defeat the monstrous Sharpspine! 

Pick up items to attack, but watch out because the Sharpspine can use these same items to attack you! 

Controls: 

Mouse and Keyboard: WASD to move. Space to jump. Left mouse button to throw/shoot

Xbox Controller: Left analogue stick to move. A to jump. B to throw. 

This project was built in less than 2 weeks as an exploration of using Behaviour Trees to control AI.
